snippet: An amateur video appears to show a crowd removing the motionless body of Ambassador J. Christopher Stevens from a window of the American mission in Benghazi.
abstract: Amateur video showing a crowd removing the motionless body of United States Ambassador J Christopher Stevens from a window of the American mission in Benghazi, Libya, surfaces, adding new details to reports that Stevens had died of smoke inhalation while locked in a safe room.

byline.contributor: Suliman Ali Zway contributed reporting from Benghazi, Libya.

lead_paragraph: An amateur video appears to show a crowd removing the motionless body of Ambassador J. Christopher Stevens from a window of the American mission in Benghazi.

headline.seo: Video Appears to Show Libyans Retrieving Envoy’s Body
headline.main: Video Shows Libyans Retrieving Envoy’s Body
headline.print_headline: Video Shows Libyans Retrieving Envoy’s Body
